text: Ophir Gendelman (), born 19 July 1971, is an Israeli politician, diplomat, and head of the Arab Media Department of the Prime Minister of Israel. Gendelman studied at Ha-Avery High School in Haifa In 1989, he studied Arabic at the advanced stage of education, and joined the army of the Israel Defense Forces.
